refbody.section: PurposeSets the locale that is used by . The locale setting controls the character set that is used to display messages. The character set is UTF-8.

dlentry.dd: The abbreviation for the language that is to be used in the locale.
You can use the help locale set command to view a list of supported locales and translations.
The abbreviation for the country that is to be used in the locale.
You can use the help locale set command to view a list of supported locales and translations.

ul.li: The locale setting takes effect immediately for the command line in which the command was entered. For other command-line instances that might be active, the user must exit and reenter the command line for the new locale to take effect.
If a translation for a specified language is not available, US English messages are displayed.

refbody.section: ExampleSet the locale to English by using the conventions of the United States. locale set en US Locale is en_US. Charset is UTF-8.
